Remy (married), Claude (a homosexual), Pierre (involved with a girlfriend) and Alain (a bachelor) discuss sex, the female body and their affairs with them. They also discuss sex, the female body and, naturally, men. Later in the evening, they finally meet at the country house and have dinner.
